Package com.pizzashop.project4.pizzas

package com.pizzashop.project4.pizzas

    Description
    com.pizzashop.project4

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BuildYourOwn
    Represents a specific type of pizza where customers can build their own pizza by choosing toppings, size, and sauce.
    Deluxe
    Represents the Deluxe pizza, a pre-defined pizza type with a specific set of toppings.
    Meatzza
    Represents the Meatzza pizza, a pre-defined pizza type with a focus on meat toppings.
    Pepperoni
    Represents the Pepperoni pizza, a specific pizza type with pepperoni as its primary topping.
    Pizza
    Represents an abstract Pizza class defining the structure and behaviors of various pizza types.
    Seafood
    Represents the Seafood pizza, a unique pizza type featuring a selection of seafood toppings.
    Supreme
    Represents the Supreme pizza, a richly topped pizza type with a variety of ingredients.
